translations: v.（使）完美，完善；（使）完全，完成；双面印完（一页纸）；（使）合法转移（perfect 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 水乳交融；完美无谐波；十分和谐
完成式；完全型；正确几何形状

sentences.sentence: He spent more time perfecting his dance moves instead of gym work.
sentences.translation: 他用更多的时间来完善他的舞蹈动作而不是健身。

sentences.sentence: I don't know about perfecting but they want at least to be able to communicate decently.
sentences.translation: 我不知道如何完善，但他们想要至少能够得体地交流。

sentences.sentence: CIBC is also perfecting the technique for breeding parasites that prey on "disapene scale" insects.
sentences.translation: CIBC 还在完善培育寄生虫的技术，这些寄生虫以“disapene scale”昆虫为食。
